original_title: Bedtime Stories: Obituary - My Name Is Leo
overview: Leo is a young actor who is about to make itâ€”standing in front of an esoteric palm-reading auteur he is given one last shot to land the lead role in his new film. Taken by the hand of the seasoned professional, Leo experiences the depths of his ambitions and unfulfilled potential and the wonderous hights of artistic euphoria.
title: Bedtime Stories: Obituary - My Name Is Leo
